updateCost() - Method in class graphicalInterface.OutpostScreen
Updates the cost label with the current cost and disables the purchase button if required

Lets a crew member use a consumable item
use(CrewMember) - Method in class backend.CureItem
Returns true if held item is being used and removes space plague false otherwise
use(CrewMember) - Method in class backend.FoodItem
Returns true if food item is being used and decreases hunger and item held count false otherwise
use(CrewMember) - Method in class backend.MedicalItem
Returns true if medical item is being used and increases crew member health and decreases held item count; false otherwise
useActionPoint() - Method in class backend.CrewMember
Decreases the crew members action point by 1
